anime.name: Dragon Ball Z
anime.info: Goku is back with his new son, Gohan, but just when things are getting settled down, the adventures continue. Whether he is facing enemies such as Frieza, Cell, or Buu, Goku is proven to be an elite of his own and discovers his race, Saiyan and is able to reach Super Saiyan 3 form. He meets many new people, gaining allies and well as enemies, as he still finds time to raise a family and be the happy-go-lucky Saiyan he is.
1999-06-01 to 1999-08-23 (Cartoon Network Latin America - episodes 01 to 60)
1999-10-25 (Brazil, BAND - Saiyajin, Freeza and Cell Sagas)
1999-11-17 to 2000-02-27 (Cartoon Network Latin America - episodes 61 to 120)
2000-07-31 to 2000-11-26 (Cartoon Network Latin America - episodes 121 to 199)
2001-04-13 to 2001-05-29 (Cartoon Network Latin America - episodes 200 to 232)
2001-07-17 to 2001-09-14 (Cartoon Network Latin America - episodes 233 to 254)
2001-10-01 to 2001-10-15 (Cartoon Network Latin America - episodes 281 to 291)
#1: "でてこいとびきりZENKAIパワー！" (Dete Koi Tobikiri ZENKAI Power!) by MANNA (eps 1-199)
#2: "僕達は天使だった (Boku-tachi wa Tenshi datta)" by Hironobu Kageyama (eps 200-291)

Fuji TV's Official Dragon Ball Z Homepage
Madman Entertainment's Official Dragon Ball Z Homepage (Australia)
Pony Canyon's Official Dragon Ball Z Website

episode.title: Mini-Goku is Precious! I'm Gohan
The Strongest Warrior in All of History is Goku's Brother!
All Right! This is the Strongest Combo on Earth!
Piccolo's Trump Card! Gohan is a Crybaby
Goku Dies! There's Only One Last Chance
Even Enmasama is Surprised - The Fight Continues in the Next World!
Dinosaur Survival! Gohan's Difficult Training
The Great Transformation on a Moonlit Night! The Secret of Gohan's Power
Sorry, Mr. Robot - The Desert of Vanishing Tears
Don't Cry, Gohan! His First Fight
The Saiya-jin, Strongest Warriors in the Universe, Awaken
Catnap on the Serpentine Road: Goku Takes a Tumble
Hands Off! Enmasama's Secret Fruit
Such Sweet Temptation! The Snake Princess' Hospitality
Escape from Piccolo! Gohan Summons a Storm
Run, Gohan! Longing for Mount Paozu, Where Chichi is Waiting
City of no Tomorrow! The Long Road to Victory
Last Stop on the Serpentine Road: Are you Kaiosama?
The Battle With Gravity! Catch Bubbles
The Return of the Saiya-jin Legend! Goku's Roots
Come Forth, Shenlong! The Saiya-jin Finally Arrive on Earth
Unbelievable! Saibamen, Born of the Soil
Yamucha Dies! The Terror of the Saibamen
Farewell, Ten-san! Chaouzu's Suicide Strategy
Tenshinhan Cries Out! This is My Last Kikohou
An Intense Three-Hour Delay! The Kintoun Bullet Express
Leave it to Me! Gohan's Great Burst of Anger
Ferocity of the Saiya-jin! Kamisama and Piccolo Both Die
Father is Awesome! Kaio-ken, the Ultimate Finishing Technique
A Hot, Unbounded Battle! Goku vs. Vegeta
Now, Goku! A Final Technique With Everything on the Line
Battle Power Times Ten! Vegeta's Great Metamorphosis
Don't Die, Father! This is the Depth of Gohan's Power
Shoot, Kuririn! The Genki Dama Packed with Hope
Cause a Miracle! Son Gohan, the Super Saiya-jin
We're Off Into Space! The Planet of Hope is Piccolo's Homeland
Mysterious Yunzabit! The Search for Kamisama's Spaceship
Blast-off for Planet Namek! The Terror Awaiting Gohan & Company
Friends or Foes? Children of the Mysterious Giant Spaceship
Honest to Goodness? There Lies Namek, Planet of Hope
Kind-hearted Aliens ・There's the 5-Star-Ball Already
Planet Freeza No. 79 ・Vegeta Recovers!
The Dragonballs are All Here! Piccolo-san Will Also Come Back to Life
A Tough New Enemy! Freeza, Emperor of the Universe
Vegeta's Ambition! I am the Greatest Warrior in the Universe!!
Goku's Power Unleashed!! Six Days to the Ends of the Galaxy
Surprise Attack!! The Elder's Target was the Scouter!
Gohan in Peril! A Pursuing Dodoria Summons Death
Dodoria Dies by Explosion! Vegeta's Fearsome Shockwave
Escape From a Burning Planet!! A Life-or-Death Kamehameha
Courage Times One Hundred! The Warriors Gathered Under Kaio
Listen to Me Goku! Hands Off Freeza
Nothing but Goosebumps! The Handsome Warrior Zarbon's Devilish Transformation
Defend the Planet of Hope!! Kuririn's Astonishing Power-Up
Back from the Brink of Death - The Miracle Man, Vegeta
An Enormous Battle Power!! Freeza's Strategy Shattered
I'm Back to My Old Self Again!! Goku Takes On a 100G Force
Freeza's Secret Weapon! The Devilish Ginyu Special Corps
Watch Out, Bulma! The Four-Star-Ball Falls into Freeza's Clutches
Charge!! The Kaio-ken and Kamehame-Ha of an Indomitable Spirit
The Great Battle Approaches! Ginyu's Special Corps Takes the Stage
Goku on Final Approach! Smash through Freeza's Dragnet
Is This Some Super-Magic or Just a Trick!? Mr. Ghurd is Angry
The Savage ReaCoom! He's Bad, He's Strong, He's Outrageous

Uncommon Strength!! Son Goku, the Legendary Super Saiyan

What of the Battle's Outcome!? Freeza's Evil Hand Closes Around the Grand Elder
Surprise!! Goku is Ginyu and Ginyu is Goku

Whoops!! Ginyu Has Turned into a Frog
Thou Who Hast Gathered the Seven Balls - Now Speak Forth the Password
Kami-sama Also Returns! Piccolo is Revived via Super Shen Long

A Nightmare Super-Transformation!! Freeza's Battle Power Reaches One Million
Is This the End? A Brutal Power Attacks Gohan Head-On
The Tide Suddenly Turned!! Piccolo, the Warrior Who Came Late
Piccolo's Self-Confidence! I Will Be the One to Defeat Freeza
Attack Goku!! An Enraged Freeza's Second Transformation
Fear Me!! Freeza Does Battle With a Third Transformation
The Death of Dende - Come Forward, Wide-Open, Full-On Power
How I've Waited for this Moment!!! Son Goku Recovered
No... !! Vegeta, Pride of the Saiyans, Dies
The Curtain Rises Over the Ultimate Battle!! I Am Going to Defeat You

An Explosion of Anger!! Goku, Avenge Everyone's Deaths

I am Son Goku's Son!! Gohan Returns to the Battlefield
I'm Staying On This Planet!! A Final Wish Towards Victory
Let's Get It On!! Two Remain On a Vanishing Planet
Pathos of Freeza! Once He Starts Shaking, He's Unstoppable

Can't Wait 'til Morning!! Kami-sama Determines a Suicidal Course of Action

Give Chase!! The Search for Doctor Gero's Mysterious Laboratory
And the Terror Becomes Reality... No. 17 and No. 18 Awaken
Too Late to Do Anything!? The Ultimate Weapon to Kill Goku

Discovery of an Evil Egg!! Trunks' Terror
In the Face of an Enemy Unlike Any Before... Birth of a Super Namekian!!
Kamehame-Ha!? The Monster Who Possesses Goku's Ki
A Life Form of Evil and Destruction!! His Name is Artificial Human Cell
Piccolo's Regrettable Mistake! Cell Escapes Into the City!
The Secret of Cell's Birth! What Lies Below the Laboratory!?
Goku Wakes to Battle! Transcend the Super Saiyan!!
Hurry Your Training Saiyans! In the Room of Mind and Time...
The Gekiretsukodan that Split the Heavens!! Piccolo vs. Artificial Human No. 17
How I Have Waited for this Day!! Cell's Prologue to Perfection

One Final Remaining Hope... No. 16, the Wordless Warrior, Takes Action!!
No. 17 Swallowed... The Transforming Cell is a Super Gourmet
Tomorrow, I am Going To Pulverize You!! Goku's Challenge

Suddenly Full-Throttle!! The Super Power of a Radiant Vegeta
On Your Knees, Cell! I am Super Vegeta!!
Dangerous Pride!! A Challenge to Cell's Perfect Form

Super Vegeta in Peril!! An Absolutely Perfect Terror Closes In

The Fight is Over. Thank You? Son Goku!!!
I'll Be up there. Farewell with a Smile.

Camera Shy

The Losses Begin

Meal Time

Don't Mess with Me. Vegeta's first attack is filled with Anger.
Evil Lives On

Revival
Global Announcement
Learn to Fuse
The Rebirth of Vegita, Prince of Destruction! Confusion enters the Ring . . .
Race to Capsule Corp
Super Saiyan 3?!
Buu's Mutiny
I Won't Let You be Reborn. The Kame-hame-Ha to change Fate.
A Straight Path to Desturction. Kaio in Despair.
Return to the Other World
I'm going to eat You! The starving Majin's Psychic Powers . . .
A Warrior's resolve! I'm Going to Destroy Majin Buu Myself!!!
For the sake of My Loved One's! Vegita's Fall.
I Kill No More
The Evil of Men
A Big Hope. The Kids New Ultimate Attack!!!
Empty Planet
Gohans resurrection. Is that Kai-Oo-Shins Secret Weapon?
I Pulled It Out! The Legendary Zed Sword . . .
He's After the Weapon Capital!! Stop Majin Buu!
Feeding Frenzy
Bye Bye Babi Dee!!! Majin Buu Rebels . . .
Incredible Ugly!? The Special Transformation Training.
A Whole New Gohan
Search for Survivors
Majin Buu Transforms
The Birth of Super Fusion, The Name is Gotenks
Ready to Fuse?
I've given up Killing!!! Majin Buu's Boy Scout Pledge!!!
Meet Vegito
Rip in the Universe
The Impatient Destruction! The Extinction of Humanity!
The Incredible Fighting Candy
I'm Really going to fight this time! Super Gotenks Goes All Out!
I did it! The Ghosts succeeded in eliminating Majin Buu!
Inter Dimensional escape? Super Gotenks 3!
Evil Kid Buu!
End of Earth
He's over Whelming Buu. Gohan's Miraculous Power!
Battle for the Universe Begins
Buu commits a Foul! Gotenks is Absorbed.
Come Back Goku! Save the Universe.
Old Buu Emerges
Earth Reborn
Call to Action
People of Earth Unite
Buu's favorite Technique! Become Candy.
Buu's Fighting SSJ3 candy drop, and losing! Veggito gets Absorbed!
He's Always Late
Granddaughter Pan
Buu's inner body Experience, The Great Escape . . .
Goku's Next Journey
Good Bye Earth!!! Buu fall's into evil...
Buu get over here! Finish it off in Kaio-Shin-Ka!!!
Seize the future! The Big Battle over the universe.
Vegita's Hat's off. Goku, You are #1.
Hold on Vegita! A minute fight at the risk of life.
Don't tease Satan!! The original Majin Buu returns!!!
Vegeta's secret plan!! Porunga's two wishes!
Our last hope! A Really Huge Genki-Dama.
Big Appreciation! It's here, Everyone's Energy Ball...
Goku is the Strongest after all!!! Majin Buu is Destroyed...
Peace is Restored! Friend of Justice, Majin Buu!?
You're late, Goku! Everyone's Partying!
Granpa Goku! I'm Pan!!!
I'm Uubu. Now 10 years old, Formerly Majin Buu..
To Become Stronger! Goku's Dream is to Surpass it!!
